properties.name: batch.root-directory
properties.description: Root directory for VDYP batch job processing and partition files

properties.name: batch.job.auto-create
properties.description: Enable automatic creation of batch job directories

properties.name: batch.partition.default-partition-size
properties.description: Default number of partitions for parallel VDYP projection processing

properties.name: batch.partition.min-valid-file-size
properties.description: Minimum valid file size in bytes

properties.name: batch.partition.interim-dirs-cleanup-enabled
properties.description: Enable cleanup of interim partition directories after job completion

properties.name: batch.partition.job-search-chunk-size
properties.description: Chunk size for job execution search queries in Spring Batch JobRepository

properties.name: batch.reader.default-chunk-size
properties.description: Default number of FEATURE_IDs processed per chunk in ChunkBasedPolygonItemReader

properties.name: batch.thread-pool.core-pool-size
properties.description: Core pool size for batch partition processing thread pool

properties.name: batch.thread-pool.max-pool-size-multiplier
properties.description: Multiplier for maximum thread pool size (max = core-pool-size * multiplier)

properties.name: batch.thread-pool.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: Prefix for batch processing thread names

properties.name: batch.retry.max-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for VDYP projection failures

properties.name: batch.retry.backoff-period
properties.description: Backoff period in milliseconds between VDYP projection retries

properties.name: batch.skip.max-count
properties.description: Maximum number of VDYP forest records that can be skipped due to errors
